title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian dish with pasta, bacon, eggs and parmesan
steps: Cook pasta al dente according to package instructions
Fry sliced bacon in a pan until golden
Crack eggs into a bowl, add parmesan, salt and pepper, mix
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of cooking water
Turn off heat under the pan with bacon, add pasta
Add egg mixture, stirring quickly
If needed, add pasta water to achieve creamy consistency
Serve immediately sprinkled with parmesan

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, feta, olives and onions
steps: Wash and cut tomatoes into eighths
Wash and cut cucumbers into thick slices
Cut feta into cubes
Cut onion into thin half-slices
Combine vegetables, feta and olives in a large bowl
Prepare dressing: mix olive oil with vinegar, salt and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and gently mix
Serve chilled

title: Pierogi
description: Traditional Polish dumplings with potato and cheese filling
steps: Boil potatoes until soft, drain and cool
Saut√© finely chopped onion in butter until golden
Mash potatoes, add cottage cheese, onion, salt and pepper
Mix filling thoroughly
Prepare dough: mix flour with a pinch of salt and oil
Gradually add lukewarm water, kneading elastic dough
Roll out dough into a thin sheet
Cut circles with a glass, place filling in the center of each
Seal edges, forming pierogi
Cook in salted water until they float (about 3-4 minutes)
Remove with a slotted spoon
Serve with bacon bits and onions or sour cream
